SummaryEnglish: It's winter in the big city of Yanagihara, and young people will meet and fall in love. Takashi is a boy who plans to escape to another world, but is held back by thoughts of his younger sister Kobato and girlfriend Asuka. Shusuke is a poor part-timer who has to work with student-author Hiyoko in spite of their initial dislike for each other. The antisocial Hayato makes his living as a handyman until he is visited by a girl named Naru.

1.SummaryEnglish: An OVA bundled with the non-adult version of the OreTsuba PC game. The OVA has more fan service than the TV series (what they call, "nakedness plus 90%").

1.TitleEnglish: For Example, That Kind of Fairytale
1.SummaryEnglish: DJ Condor is your guide as the everyday lives of several young city-dwellers come into focus on the streets of Yanagihara, a bustling metropolis where there's no shortage of stories.

2.TitleEnglish: The Animal I Like is the Pegasus
2.SummaryEnglish: Chronically under-employed Hayato Narita is hired to help a young girl -- the sister of a local gang leader -- find her stolen bicycle. Meanwhile, Shusuke Chitose is tasked with reviewing the autobiography of an ex-porn star.

3.SummaryEnglish: After arriving for his first shift at Karuo's Alexander, Shusuke learns he'll be trained by Hiyoko. Later, when the YFB rumbles with R-Wing, Hayato finds himself in the middle of the action.

4.TitleEnglish: Drac... I May Have Gotten Pregnant...
4.SummaryEnglish: Ai and Naru create a few awkward situations while competing for Hayato's attention. Meanwhile, some truly unusual events unfold at Alexander involving Kakeru, Shusuke, and a bizarre -- and violent -- customer.

5.TitleEnglish: O, How Virtuous is Our Honored Hawk!
5.SummaryEnglish: Takashi may have trouble grasping the various conditions that go along with "dating" Asuka, but that's nothing compared to facing ten thousand monsters on the field of battle!

6.SummaryEnglish: Chitose gets an eyeful when a grateful Hiyoko tenderly dresses his wound. Later, Drac warns Otori about a dangerous man in a hat.

7.SummaryEnglish: Garuda, the King of Gretagard, seizes control of Takashi's body and reunites with his old friend Phoenix. When the king's lusty desires lead him to Kobato, familial relations get creepy with a quickness!

8.SummaryEnglish: When Lord Hawk is pierced by a poisoned blade, Sparrow uses her body as a tool to help him expel the venom. Back at school, Takashi gets caught in a tug-of-war between a bossy blonde and a Watarai.

9.SummaryEnglish: Shusuke assumes control of Takashi for the day, Hiyoko hears some heartbreaking criticism of her latest literary effort, and Naru recruits some friends to help find her missing bicycle!

10.TitleEnglish: Please, Always Be a Fan, Okay?
10.SummaryEnglish: Hayato quickly handles the all-important grad essay situation, but when he gets caught in an awkward situation with a couple of young girls, he gives way to Shusuke, who manages to save Hiyoko's writing career!

11.TitleEnglish: Are You Familiar With the Concept of Little Sister Moe?
11.SummaryEnglish: Haneda's day out features a slightly creepy conversation on the forbidden secrets of little sister moe, and Watarai gets physical when her boyfriend disappears into his dreamland!

12.SummaryEnglish: As Haneda slowly lets go of his fantasy world, he discovers the reason for his very existence and reaches out to those who helped him along the way.
